position: MTS-Software @Siemens EDA | Ex-Data Science Intern @Kotak Mahindra Bank @OLA Mobility Institute | IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: • Conducted individual analysis of parameter values, including home loan, credit card limit, UPI transaction value, mutual fund value, life insurance, car loan, utility bills, and personal loan, to accurately predict relationship values• Implemented a robust data preprocessing technique by creating small intervals and consolidating data points within each interval, resulting in a substantial improvement in the Pearson correlation coefficient from 0.02 to 0.95• Developed and trained highly accurate linear regression models on the preprocessed data, achieving an impressive average R-square value of 0.92• Demonstrated strong analytical skills by effectively analyzing a large dataset of over 10 million points and deriving meaningful insights
experience.description_html: • Conducted individual analysis of parameter values, including home loan, credit card limit, UPI transaction value, mutual fund value, life insurance, car loan, utility bills, and personal loan, to accurately predict relationship values• Implemented a robust data preprocessing technique by creating small intervals and consolidating data points within each interval, resulting in a substantial improvement in the Pearson correlation coefficient from 0.02 to 0.95• Developed and trained highly accurate linear regression models on the preprocessed data, achieving an impressive average R-square value of 0.92• Demonstrated strong analytical skills by effectively analyzing a large dataset of over 10 million points and deriving meaningful insights

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: • Built a choropleth map using the Folium library of Python for state-wise comparison of the number of accidents, injuries, and deaths• Designed a dashboard using Tableau for Delhi consisting of a map and various plots to analyze the situation of road accidents in the city• Detected hotspots of road accidents in the East Bardhaman District of West Bengal with the help of a heat map built in Tableau• Identified possible causes of road accidents by constructing various plots and reported them to the concerned authorities• Built and deployed a machine learning model to predict accident probabilities based on various input parameters
experience.description_html: • Built a choropleth map using the Folium library of Python for state-wise comparison of the number of accidents, injuries, and deaths• Designed a dashboard using Tableau for Delhi consisting of a map and various plots to analyze the situation of road accidents in the city• Detected hotspots of road accidents in the East Bardhaman District of West Bengal with the help of a heat map built in Tableau• Identified possible causes of road accidents by constructing various plots and reported them to the concerned authorities• Built and deployed a machine learning model to predict accident probabilities based on various input parameters
